entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Grand Rapids
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:23 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Grand Rapids 04:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Temperature: -13.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -15.3°C
Wind: E 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Local amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
